Package com.github.mdogdope.jcards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
com.github.mdogdope.jcards.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of cards and provides methods to manipulate the deck.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mike Heston

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Creates a new Deck object with one set of 52 cards.
    Deck​(int deckCount)
    Creates a new Deck object with multiple sets of 52 cards.

  • Method Details

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles all the cards in the deck, with time set as seed.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle​(int seed)
      Shuffles all the cards using a randomizer seeded with given seed
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed to use in the randomizer.

    • add

      public void add​(Card card)
      Adds a Card object to the bottom of the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - The Card object to add.

    • deal

      public Card deal()
      Takes the top Card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The Card object that was on top.

    • deal

      public Card deal​(int index)
      Deals the card at a given index.
      Parameters:
      index - The location of the card object.
      Returns:
      The card at the given index.

    • size

      public Integer size()
      Returns an integer denoting the amount of cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      The number of cards left.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if deck has no cards in it.
      Returns:
      A boolean.

    • search

      public Integer search​(int suit, int value)
      Search for a specific card.
      Parameters:
      suit - The suit of card to find.
      value - The value of the card to find.
      Returns:
      The index of the card or -1 if not found.
